stripped_text: +2 mu You have +1 maximum hand size. When your turn ends, if you and the Corp have the same number of credits, you may gain 2 credits. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +2[mu] You have +1 maximum hand size. When your turn ends, if you and the Corp have the same number of credits, you may gain 2[credit]. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Supercorridor
